header.title: Defining Views Terminology (Draft - feature planned for 0.8)

body.p: This document will eventually define all of the terminology. See various email to the forrest dev mailing list, especially Re: Defining Views Terminology and see the draft document site-author/content/xdocs/TR/2005/WD-forrest10.html

section.title: What *is* forrest:views (f:v)?
section.p: forrest:views is the codename for the Apache Forrest implementation of the Core J2EE Pattern - Dispatcher View.

section.title: Further information
section.p: See the various How-to documents about views, starting with installing views.
